EditTextPreference.android:title: High Value
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The maximum value you consider to be in range.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Low Value
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The minimum value you consider to be in range.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display Predictive Values
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: DexDrip will attempt to predict readings each minute based on the past few values, this is not always accurate.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Prevent Phone from Sleeping
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, Dexdrip will continue to display and not allow the screen to turn off.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Max Battery Value
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The maximum millivolt value for your voltage divider if you didn't use the documented resistors

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum Battery Value
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The minimum millivolt value for your voltage divider if you didn't use the documented resistors
